first_reading.text:
[[Pr 30,5]]Every word of God is tested ; he is a shield to those who take refuge in him.
[[Pr 30,6]]Add nothing to his words, lest he reprove you, and you be exposed as a deceiver.
[[Pr 30,7]]Two things I ask of you, deny them not to me before I die:
[[Pr 30,8]]Put falsehood and lying far from me, give me neither poverty nor riches; (provide me only with the food I need;)
[[Pr 30,9]]Lest, being full, I deny you, saying, "Who is the LORD?" Or, being in want, I steal, and profane the name of my God.
first_reading.title: Book of Proverbs

psalm.text:
[[Ps 119,29]]Remove from me the way of falsehood, 
and favor me with your law.

[[Ps 119,72]]The law of your mouth is to me more precious 
than thousands of gold and silver pieces.

[[Ps 119,89]]Your word, O LORD, endures forever; 
it is firm as the heavens.

[[Ps 119,101]]From every evil way I withhold my feet, 
that I may keep your words.

[[Ps 119,104]]Through your precepts I gain discernment; 
therefore I hate every false way.

[[Ps 119,163]]Falsehood I hate and abhor; 
your law I love.
psalm.title: Psalms

gospel.text:
[[Lc 9,1]]Jesus summoned the Twelve and gave them power and authority over all demons and to cure diseases,
[[Lc 9,2]]and he sent them to proclaim the kingdom of God and to heal the sick.
[[Lc 9,3]]He said to them, "Take nothing for the journey, neither walking stick, nor sack, nor food, nor money, and let no one take a second tunic.
[[Lc 9,4]]Whatever house you enter, stay there and leave from there.
[[Lc 9,5]]And as for those who do not welcome you, when you leave that town, shake the dust from your feet in testimony against them."
[[Lc 9,6]]Then they set out and went from village to village proclaiming the good news and curing diseases everywhere.
gospel.title: Holy Gospel of Jesus Christ according to Saint Luke
